title: Kicks + No game in match history ?
body: Hello ! Any one else have also problem today with LoL on West server ? Today i play 3 games ... 1 - no connection with server while loading game screen ( i can back to game when already other players vote for remake, but my webbrowser works normal in this time ) In this moment i reset router change wi-fi canal + reset computer , Next game ping jumping up to 500 all the time 3th game i play 20-30 min and in one moment game start "Attepting to reconnect" and when i decide to leave and reset client game just gone .. no game in match history + no possibility to recconect ...

replies.body: Ahhh it sounds like that match probably crashed server side if you never had the option to reconnect at all. When that happens, you can't find the match history since no results were ever recorded due to the crash. You don't get any punishments for those, so no worries there, and you should be able to requeue like it never happened.
